title: BOUCLÉ JACQUARD COAT
desc: Knee-length coat made from cotton- and wool-blend bouclé jacquard. This model features trim-finished edges and metal buttons with a raised Pegaso symbol.• Regular fit• Crew-neck• Fastened with Pegaso buttons• Patch pockets on the front• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
